pageContext.claim: “That's more than five times the gains in all eight years under the Obama administration.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a misleading statistic ginned up by the fact that Barack Obama took office in the midst of the Great Recession. It's also cherry-picked, as Trump is comparing Obama's full term to only the first three years of his term. Once Trump completes his term, his economic record is going to take a beating from the impact of the coronavirus pandemic and may not compared favorably with Obama's record.
